NICE

Cant wait to play James Pond 2 again :)

i think WinUAE is able to emulate a CD32. Havn't tried it though.
Pretty sure Cloanta comes with a bios for CD32 aswell

it's on the Amiga Forever ISO that I bought, so I can play >:)

anyways, i will help seeding this
I don't have my computer on when i sleep. But i'll seed until i go to bed and then continue seeding tomorrow.
Cannon Fooder needs some kind of key
@Q91: hmm no it doesn't. I just ran it in WinUAE (with the CD32 kickrom). Only tried two missions but it worked fine.
I also used WinUAE, but after the Amiga CD 32 logo, i get a screen with a key that goes into a thing that has a red and green button
and I think i need a special configuration for James Pond 2, when it comes to the "movie" (i think), even tho the framerate states 50Hz, the movie moves less than 1 frame per 5th second
you're right, James Pond 2 doesn't seems to be working. the screen that shows up is for write protecting save games thougn and not a manual protection or something like that.
Just noticed that James Pond 2 does work, you cannot run CD32 games from images directly but you have to mount them with Daemon Tools first.
